website_summaries.verdict: These treats have a satisfying taste, while also helping with dental health.
pros: These fish skin dog treats are dried from wild-caught Atlantic catfish
Processing occurs in the United States, so the food is safe for the animals
These treats are naturally low in fat
The texture of the treats allows dogs to clean their teeth as they chew
cons: Dogs occasionally may swallow the treats whole, which negates the dental benefits

customer_reviews.title: The pictures say it all
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd try these Beams after learning about them on a blog. I don't like to let my little old man have rawhide, and I prefer whole foods for my pets, so that rules out most commercially available pet chews. He chewed bully sticks for awhile, then lost interest. The delivery man just brought these moments ago and...well, the pictures say it all. Little man approves! He didn't stop until it was completely gone. He hasn't done that since he was a puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs say YES!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old JRT has pancreatitis and I’ve made major changes to her diet as a result. These are low fat so they fit the bill for her and my other JRT likes them too! I’ve being doing a fair bit of research since my girl’s diagnosis and THK has a good reputation for quality ingredients. There is so much garbage going into pet foods - I had no idea. It’s difficult to find products that aren’t pushed using deceptive advertising with inferior ingredients but it seems THK breaks that mold. Pricey, yes, but I had been putting my vet’s kids through grad school!
customer_reviews.author: W.E.

customer_reviews.title: Not crunchy at all
customer_reviews.text: They are too thick & difficult to chew for my 16lb dog. He choked even though I gave him half lengs then peeled in 1 layer. Luckily he finally spit out. I thought I had to open his mouth to get it out from his throat. Up date. Additional star for I roasted in high temperature in oven to crisp up. Now crunchy & safe for my dog I don't have to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: MiO

customer_reviews.title: Not useful as a chew stick.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with the notion that they might give my lab puppy something healthier to chew on than the hardwood mulch my dog loves to chew. Both my puppy and older dog go absolutely nuts for one of these when i open the bag....but there is no real chew factor to these brittle thin skins. They are devoured pretty instantly and therefore don’t fit the bill for a nice long chew treat. They are also incredibly stinky....I would only feed outside. Seems to promote smelly gas as well. In sum, fun for the dogs, but not much in these to recommend for the humans....
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Knauer

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy enjoys these. But FYI- At first they used to give him the squirts, making his stool really runny. Now it’s just a little wet. I’ve come to realize that any raw or seemingly raw treat will do that. He gets that way with the KIWI raw lamb bites that I give him as treats and also with the freeze dried nuggets from Primal. The smell for me isn’t off putting but for some it can be.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Stinky fishy tough chews, mmm,  yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Stinky, smelly, stiff and tough as rawhide, no beef, just one good chew. My Bichon Oliver loves to chew and crunch for hours. These long, 1inch wide fish skins take him forever to rip apart. I used to buy him bully sticks but wanted to give this spoiled little fluff ball a healthier chew. These are super tough and hard, you can't break them with scissors, I'm thinking lawn clippers. These are long too, so I don't break them. He has had one he keeps gnawing on in his crate and the smell goes away after a few hours. I can't find these at any local pet stores, so glad to find healthy treats with Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Linda LeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Your dog might not tolerate or even like these
customer_reviews.text: Ok, first let me say that these came highly recommended by someone who has used them for years and loves them. I have a puppy and a 9 yr old Cairn terrier. The puppy got diarrhea from eating these. The 9 yo dog got diarrhea also, and after eating one decided she doesn't like them. Now I have an expensive bag of dried fish skins I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Puppy hates these
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is an enthusiastic chewer, to say the least. I’m trying to find him something that is as good and natural as the food I feed him (Blue Wilderness) to chew on. We looked at billy sticks but once we learned what they are, we passed. We find it barbaric to feed to our puppy. So we stumbled upon these as they made a top 10 list in an article about what products are best for natural chewing. Anyway. Puppy hates them. Won’t even lick them. They do have a very strong fish scent so if you know for a fact that your dog Likes fish then these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love them.  I love the ingredient list
customer_reviews.text: One of our dogs is a walking allergy farm, so it's tough to find treats she'll like that don't have something she's allergic to. The low ingredient list on this makes it blissfully easy to see each item. The ingredients themselves are as pure and clean as I could hope for. These don't last long, maybe 10 mins or so, but the dogs sure do enjoy them, and I get to not worry about allergy dog. Don't forget to use the Smile.Amazon.com address - It's an Amazon program where many things you buy every day will generate a small donation from Amazon to the charity of your choice. Info here:
customer_reviews.author: 🌈 KT

customer_reviews.title: My doggies and cats just love them
customer_reviews.text: They smell good and they love eating fish skins as well as myself. They're for my dogs and cats but not for me. They love them so I picked up some for them I also today ordered the Cod skins they will go crazy, I to love Cod. We are just a fish-eating family. Good product - has no sh$$ in it! ps the cats just lick them, so they too approve.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kirktindoll

customer_reviews.title: Our Dogs Love These Chews
customer_reviews.text: We are owned by a Miniature Pinscher and a Lhasa Apso, they have authorized me to tell the world they love these treats. We have purchased both the Tall Beams and the Smalls Beams both are wonderfully anticipated treats by the dogs. If a piece is too big for one treat I have found them easily cut in half with kitchen scissors. The package warns to check for any fish bones, I've yet to find a bone so I believe that there must be quality control with this brand, however I will always check for a wayward visible bone.
customer_reviews.author: O. SutherlandTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love the stinky fish jerky, they can't wait! I love it 4 clean teeth & health.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love these, can't wait for me to get them out of the package! I suppose the taste is great for them, but they smell terrible to me probably because it is fish. They are tough like jerky so they last long enough to clean their teeth good! I cut them into 3 or 4 pieces and give after every meal, but of course my Italian Greyhounds are small dogs. Wish they were more reasonable in price but they are very healthy for them.
customer_reviews.author: Donice Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Stinks like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a power chewer of the highest order so finding a treat that she has to work at is tricky. She is also allergic to lots of things, including those dried bricks of yak cheese. Our journey is a winding road of trial and error. These treats seem to be just fine for her. They are similar to beef taffy. She really goes to town on these but can still finish a strip in about two minutes. They stink like you would not believe. Give them to your dog on a towel, inside their crates, a wood or tile floor, or outdoors. You do not want the stink of these in your carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Guillotine

customer_reviews.title: My dog says "More Please!"
customer_reviews.text: My pup LOVES these and they seem to be a much healthier option than many of the dog treats out there. Based on some of the questions posted, here is my response about how they smell... Yes, the do smell like fish but the bag is strong and as long as you seal it you won't have the fish smell in your house. After you give your pup the treat, just wash your hands and you won't smell like fish either. You may not want to kiss your pup for a while after they've eaten one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tiss

customer_reviews.title: My dogs look forward to having these
customer_reviews.text: I use these as dental chews for my two Bichons. My dogs chew them really well and look forward to getting them each evening. Since they are just fish skins, they will have a strong smell to them; but, I don't mind it. I've been getting these for my dogs for over a year now and have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: My one dog has allergies and we are currently trying to figure out to what. These are great because they are only one ingredient! The dog we just adopted had to have a lot of teeth pulled so we didn't think he could eat these but he loves them! They are great for this or for older dogs. My living room does smell like fish when they are done but they love them so I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them! Substitute for rawhides
customer_reviews.text: I found this on a pet website and did my research. I ended up purchasing these because there is only one ingredient: fish. The smell so bad, but our puppies absolutely love them! They are definitely worth the price and we will be buying more! It keeps our dogs busy since they do take a while to chew. I am happy that they are only one ingredient because it makes me feel better that I know what is in it for my puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Cale

customer_reviews.title: yummy but can be stinky
customer_reviews.text: My doggies really love these chews! It takes a while for them to chew through it so it keeps them busy. I feel that they are safer than bully sticks that sometimes too hard to digest when they swallow too big of a piece. It can be a bit stinky with a fishy smell, but I love fish so I don't mind and giving them extra omega is a plus. I keep buying it with monthly subscription which is a better deal. Thank you Honest kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Senior dogs favorite treat!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my senior dog to help maintain his teeth and keep him busy. My dog loves food and his treats. But when he hears me open the bag in the kitchen, he literally runs over from the bedroom. I hate rawhide and the texture on these is hard enough to take off almost all the plaque on his teeth but soft enough for his senior teeth to chew through them with no problem. I do wish they lasted longer because my medium sized 35lb dog can get through one within 2-3 minutes or so. A little expensive, but I'll take the human grade over some cheap by product any day.
customer_reviews.author: Kay__19

customer_reviews.title: So Good for your Dog
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these treats for my 17# and 28# dogs. I cut them in half with kitchen scissors as they are long. They do have a strong scent, after all they are fish. My dogs love them and we have a lot of doggie house guest who enjoy them as well. Shipping is quick and the price is the average price but the convenience of shopping from your home. I buy them regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Rider

customer_reviews.title: My dog will eat anything and won’t eat these
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old boxer loves any food or treats and has never turned any food down. I thought we’d try this as she loves salmon skin treats. She literally will not eat them and they have a horrendous fishy smell. I’ve given her other fish skin treats so know they’re stinky and messy, but I’m willing to put up with them as they’re good for her and she loves them. I had to throw these away as I’d give her one and she’d leave it uneaten for days.
customer_reviews.author: Palindrome

customer_reviews.title: House will smell like fish.. feed outside.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. They make for the perfect chew treat! Although they smell fishy I prefer a healthy chew treat over bleached cow hide. Both my dogs love to bite and chew I give these to them as treats and they've learn to chew them down fast. The only thing advice I have are... feed these outside unless u don't mind the smell. Doggies will have fishy breaths so watch out for kisses after they finish.
customer_reviews.author: M.Seraphan

customer_reviews.title: A Great Distraction
customer_reviews.text: These are a great way for me to enjoy my morning coffee peacefully. I have a 6.5 month husky pup and these keep her occupied for 20-30 minutes or so. As for smell, they do have a mild fishy odor, but nothing that’s intolerable. To the newcomers, don’t expect something on par with sardines in intensity. It’s more like the fish version of jerky. Anyway, only thing I wish is that these were a few bucks lower in price, considering how much my pup loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Moirai

customer_reviews.title: Fishy smell obviously, but dog loves them.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because my dog has diabetes and we don't give him any processed treats anymore. Even many chicken jerky have sugars or glycerins added. My dog loves these dried fish skins. They are tough so he can chew on them for a short while. It's not like a rawhide or Nylabone, but it is healthier. His hair is healthier now too. And I don't worry about giving him a treat every day. Oh, surprise, they smell like fish!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are a perfect treat to give him to distract him when I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with these. Yes, they are a little smelly, so I just have my dog take them out the dog door to chew on outside. He's only 20 lbs, but a very aggressive chewer (jack rat) for a small dog, and yet this takes him a few minutes (depending on thickness) to finish such a thin chew. For comparison, he'll finish a greenie in 30 seconds, so I usually have to freeze them to give him a little challenge. 6" bully sticks usually last him 30 min. These are a perfect treat to give him to distract him when I'm leaving the house, and are super healthy and great for his skin and coat.
customer_reviews.author: GEM

customer_reviews.title: May cause addiction and random tricks by dogs!!!
customer_reviews.text: They smell fishy, but my dog is crazy for this fish skin “crack”!!! He starts doing tricks as soon as the bag starts to open - without me asking!!! Too funny! Great product - and its so natural!
customer_reviews.author: California Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats too!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that loves to chew on things. I got these to distract her from chewing on cardboard boxes. I put them in a vice so she can get to them better. Cats don't tend to hold down things they are eating like dogs do, so putting them in the vice allows her to chew away. The cat can chew down one of these in less than a week. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill O.

customer_reviews.title: My dog didnt like these
customer_reviews.text: My usually not picky dog did not care for these. She chewed them for a few seconds then left them behind intact. She goes nuts over the 12" beams, maybe because it's a different fish and tastes better. The only good things about these was that they didnt stink like the 12" ones. I gave the bag to a friends who has several dogs, hoping at least one of them might eat it.
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these! A special snack that is healthy and not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love these for times when I want to treat my dogs with something a bit more special, but don't want to give them an entire bully stick. This keeps them busy for a little while (not as long as a bully stick, but that's to be expected) and they love them. I also love that they come in "smalls" and "talls" which are great for my little vs. bigger dogs. Highly recommend, really anything Honest Kitchen makes is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Like crack for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best dog treat we've ever gotten. These are probably the healthiest, also. The 6 oz contains 20-30 pieces which is an amazing deal. Our chihuahua goes nuts with each piece (we cut the larger ones in half) so for the price this product delivers a large amount of entertainment for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: John Climacus

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages, even seniors with less (or no) teeth!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these chews (and so do all FIVE of my fur-babies)! I feel good giving these to them because 1.) I trust this company, 2.) these chews are pure, natural and healthy, 3.) I like knowing that even if they are swallowed in a chunk (or sometimes whole) there is not a concern about any type of blockage happening (like raw hide, etc.) AND 4.) Even my older babies, who don’t have many teeth, can chew and enjoy this treat!
customer_reviews.author: v c

customer_reviews.title: My wheaten eats these fish treats so fast!
customer_reviews.text: My dog, an 8 years-old wheaten terrier, enjoys these treats. I assume by how quickly she finishes one that she enjoys their flavor and scent. I deduct one star from value because 1) these Honest Kitchen fish treats are more expensive than most treats she gets and 2) very little time to eat one
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H.

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: It smells fishy - as expected, and its pretty pungent, but it drives my pups nuts so that's a bonus. They don't get to eat fish that often so its a nice treat. I try to give it to them outside though - so I don't have to smell it, or have traces of fish on my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but both dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs absolutely love these. They don’t last very long, as a chew. About 5min if that. I have a Boxer and a Boxer mix. Definitely recommend, just wish they weren’t so expensive. Only con is they smell, we just feed these outside to deal with that.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: My fussy eater loves these
customer_reviews.text: If your pup is a fan of stinky things to eat then they will love these. My dog is a fussy eater and she has never refused one of these fish skins. Yes they are expensive but if they are eaten and no waste they are worth it. Store them in a zip bag they smell very fishy.
customer_reviews.author: marie shiffman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best dog treat ever
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these things. She likes to go out and bark in the back yard at night and will sometimes refuse to come in. All I have to do is yell "Want a fish?" out the door and she will come running. They do have a strong fish oder, but it isn't so bad that it makes the house smell.
customer_reviews.author: J. Flood

customer_reviews.title: It really works, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is not a chewer, but she loves these, and even though she has a sensitive stomach, these didn't upset her at all! If you can get passed the vile smell of fish, you will be all set! I still can't get over the smell, but she loves it, so that's all that matters!
customer_reviews.author: Anderson G. Resende

customer_reviews.title: Oh Boy!
customer_reviews.text: It makes the house smell like a fish market once you pup starts chewing on it :) My bichon loves to work on it but it smells so strong since it's a real fish skin. I'm sure a bigger dog will just swallow it in no time so you won't have to deal with the stinky fish smell :)))
customer_reviews.author: Yeliz

customer_reviews.title: Dog Crack
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to explain, but the way my dog snatches this from me you can tell he's crazy about them. I have the Talls on a monthly subscription. All I have to say is, "Fishy chew?" and I own him. He sits and I hold it out to him, he does a quick sniff and like some kind of predatory reptile, he snaps his mouth on it and then runs to a good spot to chow down. They don't take him long to eat, so don't think this will occupy your dog for long, but it'll lure him from almost any situation if your dog is as ineptly trained as mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love'em !: Amazon Prime needs to tweek packing practices.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are big fans of these chews. The four star rating is due to the Amazon Prime packing of this order. The box arrived damaged, was re-taped/sealed by the shipping co. as it was evident that the original Amazon Prime box was prepared and sealed in a fit of abstract haste. Along with these Chew there were some very heavy items included without any packing material (preferably biodegradable). It should have been mandatory to pack those heavy items separately.
customer_reviews.author: Magerck

customer_reviews.title: Our dog does flips for these (not really, but almost).
customer_reviews.text: OK they smell like stale fish, but that's what they are and our dog LOVES them. They do provide a little more chewing thn some others and Honest Kitchen is a name I trust. What more can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ingram

customer_reviews.title: My dog was scared of the fish. (Face palm)
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a great product, but neither of my dogs would go near it. It made no sense. You could see it was actually a dried fish skin. Heck, I wanted to throw them into a stew for myself, but nope, my weirdo dogs just wouldn’t go near them.
customer_reviews.author: The Wendy Lady

customer_reviews.title: healthy single ingredient treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these healthy single ingredient treats. I mean LOVES these :-). These treats are like $100 bills. I have a few other treats but those are like $1.00 bills. It takes her a couple of minutes to eat one. They aren't as stinky as some of the other fish skins.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: Truly an excellent product, for which one pays an excellent price. My dog can't really have chicken products due to allergies so kangaroo and fish are pretty much it. She thinks these are the best treat ever so it is hard to pass on buying them but I don't very often. Hard to believe the production costs are so high that these need to be so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: William Schubert

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, apparently.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tasted them, but the way my dog goes nuts for them I assume they are a real winner. My dog, even though she's small, she swallows treats quickly. I like to give her one of these so it takes her at least 3 -5 minutes to finish it.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Kissam

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: Stink but my dogs love them! The stink doesn't stay after they are finished eating them or remain on the carpet (or whatever they laid to chew). My 9# Morkie chewed through it in 10 mins. My 4# Maltese takes an hour or more. Keeps them busy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin J.

customer_reviews.title: It's not for Coon Hounds for sure!
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought these based on customer reviews. Even though my dog immediately loved them, I can only giggle at people saying their dogs took a long time to finish these, I'm going to assume these are poodles. My coon hound devoured it in less than 5 minutes. So, I'll probably not buy them again as it's a fairly spendy treat for 5 minutes of chewing.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: My corgi puppy LOVES these but she frequently gets them ...
customer_reviews.text: My corgi puppy LOVES these but she frequently gets them stuck in her throat, so I have to be very careful and watch her intently while she's gnawing away at one. I had to give her the doggie Heimlich once already so just beware that these pose a serious choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: uwu

customer_reviews.title: My 3 love them!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these, I often purchase by reviews that is why I am adding mine, I wasn't sure what to expect, having 3 dogs it is sometimes hard to find something the 3 of them will like but they all seem to love these. I did not notice their breath smelling bad and am very happy I purchase them. I love the fact they only come from ingredients made and processed in the USA, I love my dogs and this is a must when I give them anything.
customer_reviews.author: Babystine

customer_reviews.title: Smells strong but dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this, however it will mostly be an outside treat. It doesn’t smell bad, just very strongly of fish. They absolutely love them and I love that it’s a healthy treat without all those additives and junk, so I’m sure I’ll buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Asta

customer_reviews.title: Not stinky
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1 year old Cavalier King Charles who is a serious chewer...she absolutely loves these and surprisingly they last for several hours. I like that they get soft and pliable as chewing so I do not have to worry about choking danger should she bite off a big piece.
customer_reviews.author: Leela

customer_reviews.title: My doggo loves these things
customer_reviews.text: They stink like dead/dried fish skin.... because the are dead/dried fish skins! My dog goes absolutely nuts for these things, and I guess they are a healthy alternative to raw hide chews. These chews will keep even large dogs busy for a while (I'd cut them in half for smaller dogs). I plan to re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n Tim

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting & fishy
customer_reviews.text: I think these are great. My dog loves them. They provide a surprisingly long chew time. The only issue some may have is the smell. They do have a fishy smell, but your dog will love it. And isn't your dog's happiness worth a little fishy smell for 30 minutes?
customer_reviews.author: KarenTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Fish skins are a healthy choice over rodhides
customer_reviews.text: My little guy is a professional chewer hahaha He's a 10 pound dog but these arent too big or too hard for him. It also keeps him entertained for 30mins! Second time buying these bad boys and they never disappoint, plus they are SO MUCH BETTER THAN RODHIDES.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES these.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is obsessed. They make her so happy, and they don't make a mess, like rawhide. They don't last long for her, but it satiates her, which is ideal. Highly recommended. I like this brand a lot.
customer_reviews.author: polly v

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING TREAT! MY DOG LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing treat. My dog loves it because i presume it is flavorful and challenging to finish. Because it takes awhile to chomp down the strip, I would give it to him and walk away without expecting him to come back for more! It is my go to treat every morning after giving him a regular meal. I wish the price comes down a bit but I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: CHOKING hazard.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't give to my dogs. Too dangerous. SHARP, tough. Extreme choking hazard
customer_reviews.author: Michell Weaver

customer_reviews.title: 5 paws all the way
customer_reviews.text: My pups love these things. They always run away with an extra pep in their step and a grin when I give them one. The smell isn't bad. I just wish my dogs did't plow through them as fast.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality chews
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these! I can’t speak to the flavor of them, but they make the dogs very happy and they are much better quality than most chews so well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Kala K Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Fish sticks are messy
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes these, but after he’s been chewing for a bit, they get soggy and I think the fins get caught on his bed cover. Now there’s small holes on his bed. Debi & Doodle Bob McDonald
customer_reviews.author: Debi McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Yummy for hounds
customer_reviews.text: These are a staple in our house. My greyhound just goes crazy when we pull these out. They last longer than a regular treat but boy do they smell! We keep them under our sink where the scent won’t waft up. I really like that these are all natural.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Henry

customer_reviews.title: Garbo the Chiweenie recommends these
customer_reviews.text: My adorable dog loves these. She’s only 10 lbs. so I cut them into smaller strips (not easy to cut). But her skin and coat and eyes are clear, shining and soft. The odor is a bit strong but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dyhar

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and probably unsafe
customer_reviews.text: Smell disgusting and made my dogs breath stink all day. Think they still have the same risk of choking like regular raw hides- my dog coughed up a big piece. Not going to use the rest of the bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They love the strong salmon smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my extremely picky labradoodle. He doesn’t eat them unless other doggy friends come over for treats and then he joins in. Every dog that comes over to play LOVES these beams. Great chew stick for teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamville

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treat, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Finn LOVES these simple, single ingredient, human grade, crunchy treats. They smell a little fishy (it’s fish skins...), but it’s not unpleasant at all. I only give them occasionally due to price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! So did the dogs!! They don’t last nearly as long as I’d like to keep them busy (lasts about a minute or so) but the dogs go crazy for them! They are super duper smelly! That may bother some people. Quality and size were perfect for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: TrueTomboy

customer_reviews.title: Good for most pups. Power chewers will finish these on minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love them. Last a while for average pups. Power chewers finish fast but you have a shelf stable treat for them when you need a break! Only downside is they sprinkle your home with fish scales.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Harbor Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Safe for a dogs digestion. Suppose to clean teeth
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t smell but sheds scale-like flakes al over. My Dog seems to like it. Let my 3 month old pup try them and there was no digestive upset but as it is chewed down, must watch for choking
customer_reviews.author: L. E. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs, if you can tolerate the stink
customer_reviews.text: My Irish Setter absolutely loved these, and she’s very picky and spoiled about food. So, it’s a huge bummer, that my husband said never ever buy these again, because of the strong, intolerable fish stench that permeated my entire home. Even like, rooms the bag wasn’t in. I’ve never smelled anything like it. Good for dogs, not so good for people.
customer_reviews.author: CEB

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT !
customer_reviews.text: This dog treat is the BEST. Not only are they healthy, but easy to chew. I have a dog with only his front teeth, and I do not worry he will get a piece of fish stick lodged in his throat. I have given this treat to ALL my beagles. Without fail, not only to they benefit from them physically, they love love love love the taste. AWESOME PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 beagles and a hound and they absolutely LOVE this chewies. They are fishy smelling and a little more than I would normally spend but it's worth it to watch them play with them and eat them. Plus they are are natural and much better for the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Her FAVORITE treat!
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes insane over these - almost an out of body experience for her. Whenever we get anywhere close to the area these are stored, she turns into the most well-behaved doggo ever. Once we give one to her, she sprints off to make sure nobody interrupts her fish stick time. Sure, they are fishy - but smell about as bad as fish food and the stink doesn't linger.
customer_reviews.author: AG0323

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast shipping!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 1 day? Lol my dog so Spoiled, miniature dachshund he's About 10lbs and i order the cod beams And use scissors to cut a piece for him Since the beams are about a foot long!!! He loves the crunchy texture and i will Be ordering again VERY soon! THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Smokey G Tiny Locos

customer_reviews.title: Wonderdful results!
customer_reviews.text: Rescued new member in the family, Molly, 12 lbs. has benefited greatly from these chews as teeth are looking beter and better! Sure to reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Helen S.

customer_reviews.title: Kinda smelly
customer_reviews.text: As soon as my dogs got these treats wet with saliva my house smelled like rotten fish. I put them out in the yard and they really had no interest in them.
customer_reviews.author: BJS

customer_reviews.title: My pet loves them
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple of times to get my dog to know these were to eat! She'd walk around with it like a prize. Finally broke it up and she discovered the flavor. Now she devours them as soon as she gets it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Z

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 6 oz pack. As described with a genuine fishy smell. My dog just loves it. It works as a really great treat. Human grade/wild caught.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag of chews not sealed properly, came with ants in shippong box
customer_reviews.text: Dogs liked chews. Chews did not last long at all. He was done in 2 minutes and she took 6. When item arrived the bag was open as though it had not been produced correctly (the 'tear here' part was intact).
customer_reviews.author: V. Bones

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! CHOKING HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: My French bulldog is allergic to everything but fish, so I thought these would be a good alternative to rawhide. He liked the taste of them, but he was able to swallow them whole. Severe choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Nylabone Alternative
customer_reviews.text: My dog went crazy for these, yes they do smell a bit fishy so either take them outside or just light a candle (or two) while your dog is going at it. My dog had no stomach aches after use. Definitely still have to watch your pup carefully as it starts to become a choking hazard if the piece is really wide towards the end (Length and Width vary in the bag) I’d say my 6 month old frenchie got through half a large size piece in about two hours then took a long nap from working at it so hard. All in all will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Only if your dog is a fish fan!
customer_reviews.text: They appear good quality, and nice size. Our German shepherd puppy just isn't a fan. He sorta mouthed the first one, but never touched the second.
customer_reviews.author: eyelover

customer_reviews.title: Stinky dental fish treats to distract your doggies!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. They are very chewy. I have a mini dachsund that's almost impossible to brush her teeth so I give her this during those missed brushings. Also it keeps them busy for at least 10 minutes. I would highly recommend unless the strong smell of fish makes you queasy. They reek but the stinkier the better for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: RandellB.

customer_reviews.title: Good for aggressive chewers
customer_reviews.text: Dog absolutely loves them! Keep the bag closed for freshness and smell. My girl is 11 mo old GoldenDoodle that is an aggressive chewer. Amazingly it takes her 20 min to devour this. She's started hunting for them in my bags!
customer_reviews.author: Plundered treasure

customer_reviews.title: My 3 Dogs Won't Eat Anything Else!
customer_reviews.text: I have two basset hounds and a boxer/lab that love these!! They are great for their teeth to chew on. And, I don't have to worry about the products and ingredients. You can tell they use high-quality ingredients on the bag, but also, by the look and smell of these! The smell is pretty potent, but my dogs love them! We get them every week!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Fish Skins
customer_reviews.text: Love all products by Honest Kitchen. My dogs love to chew the skins, great for their teeth and skin! Love the fact all their products are human grade! Have been feeding THE products since the company started!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Golding

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog who is about 40lbs loves these dog treats! By the crunch it sounds like she is eating potato chips.
customer_reviews.author: C. Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Best treats for dogs with allergies!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a treat for my dog who is allergic to everything!!! He goes bananas when I give him one of these. Thank you for making these!!!
customer_reviews.author: christine spencer

customer_reviews.title: My girls favorite
customer_reviews.text: Usually my girl needs variety when it comes to her food and treats but these are her absolute favorite! She can't get enough. I only wish they were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth larocca

customer_reviews.title: DOG LOVES THEM BUT WOW THE SMELL!!
customer_reviews.text: My small (terrier/Chihuahua) dog loves these "bones". It takes him a awhile to chew them up, which I like. But the unused bag definitely needs to be stored somewhere away from humans, the odor is VERY dead fishy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love Em!
customer_reviews.text: These are my dogs favorite treat. They stink to us humans but the dogs absolutely love it. These also work well for teeth since they require the dogs to gnaw them down for a while before consuming. These can be a little pricey so I use these along with other, cheaper treats.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rainwater

customer_reviews.title: Great natural treat
customer_reviews.text: My 8lb Brussels Griffon LOVES these. They are great for her coat and her teeth. The smell is not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: samantha wolliston-flood

customer_reviews.title: Dogs favorite treat.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. She starts licking her lips every time I reach for them. The only advice is to feed it to your dog outside because there is a very strong fishy smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great treat, just wish it was cheaper
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey for the amount but my dogs love it. Wish it was cheaper. Doesn’t smell as bad. Doesn’t last long either as he hobbled it up within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLoverTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Safe, healthy and excellent Return of Investment
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy and satisfied with the product. My pet loves this. Safe and healthy too.
customer_reviews.author: Soumya Mitra

customer_reviews.title: My doggies love them
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 yorkies and 1 mini schnauzer yorkie mix. They are 8-11 pounds. They love these. A little pricey for the amount so I don't give often.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Fish Skin Chews
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these for my dog for 6yrs, and wouldn't think of changing. They are chewy, healthy and my dog loves them. Since she's allergic to everything but fish and potatoes, they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: jody Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: My dogs loved them
customer_reviews.text: I fed the Beams treats to my dogs under supervision to watch for choking or swallowing whole. My 12 week old puppy and my 15 year old dog both enjoyed them. It took 5-10 minutes for the dogs to finish the treats. The skins are quite stinky but the smell did not linger once they were done eating.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and take some time to chew
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite dog treat because they are very affordable and lightweight but take our 20lb hound/terrier mix a good 5 minutes or so to chew when we need something to occupy her for a bit. Yes like any high quality natural fish treat they smell fishy but I’ve smelled worse! Much better for your dog than bogus rawhide from China
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Jay

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love, great for teeth!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these fish "jerky", is smelly but they love smell to. Great for their teeth!
customer_reviews.author: Donice Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves theses
customer_reviews.text: The sting is just fishy, but she loves it, so we getting it for her now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel Smetana

product_meta.title: The Honest Kitchen Ocean Chews Grain Free Dog Chew Treats – Natural Human Grade Dehydrated Fish Skins
product_meta.description: Size:6.0 oz| Style:Wolffish SkinsBeams made with just one ingredient—pristine wild caught fish skins. These savory, chewy sticks are guaranteed to satisfy the pickiest of pups. The act of gnawing on these longer lasting chews can help maintain tip-top dental health too. A solid source of lean protein and Omega-3s, it's no wonder these are our best-selling treats!.
feature_bullets: JUST ONE INGREDIENT: This high protein dog chew is made with only dehydrated wild caught fish and loaded with Omega-3s.
HUMAN GRADE: The Honest Kitchen meets the rigorous FDA safety standards to use the label 'human grade', ensuring the highest quality dog treats.
ALL NATURAL: This healthy dog chew is made with no by-products, preservatives or fillers and is Non-GMO Project verified.
MADE IN THE USA: Processed in the USA in a human grade food processing facility with nothing from China.
DENTAL DOG TREAT: Gnawing on these longer lasting dental chews can help clean teeth and support healthy gums.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
